QuestData.Title: Ivus the Forest Lord
QuestData.CompletionText: The Frostwolf Clan is protected by a taint of elemental energy. Their shaman meddle in powers that will surely destroy us all if left unchecked.$b$bThe damage has grown too great for the Circle to control! Ivus must be called to our aid.$b$bThe Frostwolf soldiers carry elemental charms called storm crystals. We can use the charms to conjure Ivus. Venture forth and claim the crystals, $n!
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $N. I will use the power of this charm to augment the magic that has already been gathered. When enough power has been amassed, I shall focus the collected energies and call upon the Forest Lord to aid our cause.
